conclusion: To solve this problem, we need to trace the path of the liquid flowing from points A, B, and C through the baffles to the containers at the bottom.
The pink liquid starts from the top left at point A.
The pink liquid flows down a white baffle.
The pink liquid flows horizontally to the left and is guided by the black baffle downwards.
The pink liquid flows into the container labeled D.
The green liquid starts from the top middle at point B.
The green liquid flows down a yellow baffle.
The green liquid flows horizontally to the right.
The green liquid flows into the container labeled F.
The blue liquid starts from the top right at point C.
The blue liquid flows down a blue baffle.
The blue liquid flows horizontally to the left and is guided by the orange baffle downwards.
The blue liquid flows into the container labeled G.
The liquid from A flows into container D.
The liquid from B flows into container F.
The liquid from C flows into container G.
